channel.title: Is it possible to host multiple servers on 1 ip?
channel.description: Hmm... would you be able to make a new world which has a different server in it? o.O I'm trying to figure out if I could make the same game in a 317, and 508.

item.title: Is it possible to host multiple servers on 1 ip?
item.dc:creator: @animeking1120 animeking1120
item.description:
@animeking1120 wrote:

depends on what you have but most are in server.java and ive sen some in run.bat

item.title: Is it possible to host multiple servers on 1 ip?
item.dc:creator: @animeking1120 animeking1120
item.description:
@animeking1120 wrote:

well i dont know if its possible to run the same server twice, but to run multiple servers all you have to do is change one of them to port 5555 instead of 43594.and just portforward port 5555 the same way. hope this helps

Read full topic
